Package ca.mcgill.ecse211.project

Class Resources

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.mcgill.ecse211.project.Resources
  • public class Resources
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used to define static resources in one place for easy access and to avoid cluttering the rest of the codebase. All resources can be imported at once like this:

    import static ca.mcgill.ecse211.lab3.Resources.*;

      • SERVER_IP

        public static final java.lang.String SERVER_IP
        The IP address of the server that transmits data to the robot. For the beta demo and competition, replace this line with

        public static final String SERVER_IP = DEFAULT_SERVER_IP;
